rows.label: tev023301_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev023301_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Sherry about the weather in Primordia.

rows.label: tev023301_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev023301_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Sherry if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev023301_SEL0031
rows.name:
Ask Sherry about BLADE's
theater of operations on Mira.

rows.label: tev023301_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask Sherry if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev023301_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Sherry about Sylvalum.

rows.label: tev023301_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask Sherry if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev023301_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask Sherry about Sylvalum.

rows.label: tev023301_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask Sherry if she's heard any interesting rumors.

rows.label: tev023301_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Sherry about recent developments.

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0001
rows.name:
The weather on Mira changes abruptly and often.
They say it's as fickle as a young lover's heart.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0002
rows.name:
Oftentimes you'll head out on a bright, clear morning
and end up soaked from thunderstorms by noon.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0003
rows.name:
Veteran BLADEs tend to carry a wide variety of
equipment in order to respond to changing weather.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0004
rows.name:
For example, electrified weaponry is especially effective
during thunderstorms![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0010
rows.name:
Did you hear about the BLADE who found an unusual
flower while she was on a mission in Primordia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0011
rows.name:
It turned out to be an indigen that was just
camouflaged as a flower. Thing attacked her out of
nowhere—she's lucky she wasn't killed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0012
rows.name: I hear the poor girl is totally traumatized now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0013
rows.name:
Even the get-well flowers she's been receiving have left
her screaming and shaking like a leaf, poor thing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0020
rows.name:
What are you talking about?
This entire planet is BLADE's theater of operations![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0021
rows.name:
BLADEs are pushing through to the far corners of
Mira—crossing fields, climbing mountains, island
hopping over seas, whatever it takes![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0022
rows.name:
And when they hurt themselves doing it,
they get dragged right back here to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0023
rows.name:
But when that happens, I'll take good care of you.
So don't be afraid to get out there and do some
adventuring![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0030
rows.name:
Did you know that some particularly dangerous
indigens self-destruct when they're near death?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0031
rows.name:
One indigen was chased down and surrounded by an
entire team of BLADEs when it detonated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0032
rows.name:
I know because they were all brought in here
afterward—one big happy family of injured![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0033
rows.name:
So if you're a BLADE yourself, please be careful.
Never drop your guard until the battle is well and
truly over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0040
rows.name:
That's the continent to the far north or northeast of
here, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0041
rows.name:
Sounds like a pretty dangerous region. We see a lot of
fallen BLADEs carried back from there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0042
rows.name:
Though some veteran BLADEs say it's just a passage to
the true hell that lies even farther north.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0043
rows.name:
Regardless, if you're going to Sylvalum,
make sure that you're especially well prepared.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0050
rows.name:
Apparently some intelligent indigens sap their target's
will to fight before they strike.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0051
rows.name:
Even after we patch them up, BLADEs that were struck
by such lethargy-inducing attacks remain languid and
dispirited.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0052
rows.name:
I try to rouse them out of it by singing and dancing,
buuuuut...yeah. It never gets much of a reaction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0053
rows.name:
What do you BLADEs do out on the field to raise
each other's spirits?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0060
rows.name:
I heard there's an incredible scenic viewpoint at
the peak of a jagged mountain in central Sylvalum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0061
rows.name:
When the mist clears, you get a sweeping view of the
white earth below, dotted by beautifully shimmering
trees.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0062
rows.name:
I know this because some BLADEs have become
entranced by the view and ended up losing their
balance and tumbling down the mountain.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0063
rows.name:
That's one hell of an endorsement!
I'd sure love to see it for myself one day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0070
rows.name:
Sometimes BLADEs get complacent when battling
indigens they've fought dozens of times before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0071
rows.name:
Then the battle takes a turn, the BLADE gets an
unexpected beating, and they end up here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0072
rows.name:
Any group of indigens could contain an individual
that's far more powerful than normal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG0073
rows.name:
So even a gifted BLADE like yourself should take every
battle seriously.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG1001
rows.name:
I came to this restaurant once to escort Ni Zain back
to the maintenance center.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG1002
rows.name:
But I ended up falling madly in love with the curry they
sell, and now it's the only thing I eat. ...Seriously.
Every meal. Breakfast, lunch, AND dinner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG1003
rows.name:
I know I've become like a Ma-non addicted to pizza,
but I can't help it! It's just so damn good![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG1004
rows.name:
I can't even describe what makes it so good.
It's not spicy or sweet, really. Just...exquisite![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev023301_MSG1005
rows.name:
I'm drooling just thinking about it... Mmmrrrggghhh...
Must...have...one more bowl...[ST:wait ]
